name: Bark
description: What is Bark (BARK)? The Bark token launched on March 2nd, 2023, is an ERC-20-based token which builds utilities for every cryptocurrency trader looking to build or trade on the highly anticipated Shibarium Network. Some of the utilities of BARK are Staking, New Pairs Tracker, Bark Vanish, Automated Audit reports and Liquidity along with Token Locker. Building and Developing necessary utilities for Shibarium is the main goal for the Bark Token. Through the Whitepaper, an in-depth explanation of the Bark Tools & Utilities are provided.
